info.description: These APIs provide services for manipulating Harbor project.
info.title: Harbor API

put.description:
This endpoint let user generate a new CLI secret for himself.  This API only works when auth mode is set to 'OIDC'.
Once this API returns with successful status, the old secret will be invalid, as there will be only one CLI secret
for a user.
put.summary: Set CLI secret for a user.

403.description: Non-admin user can only generate the cli secret of himself.

412.description: The auth mode of the system is not "oidc_auth", or the user is not onboarded via OIDC AuthN.

401.description: User need to log in first.

400.description: Invalid user ID.  Or user is not onboarded via OIDC authentication. Or the secret does not meet the standard.

parameters.description: JSON object that includes the new secret
parameters.name: input_secret

put.description: This endpoint is for update gc schedule.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

401.description: User need to log in first.

post.description: This endpoint is for update gc schedule.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

401.description: User need to log in first.

409.description: There is a "gc" job in progress, so the request cannot be served.

get.description: This endpoint is for get schedule of gc job.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: Get the metrics of the latest scan all process
get.summary: Get the metrics of the latest scan all process

403.description: Request is not allowed

401.description: Unauthorized request

get.description: This endpoint is to search the users by username.

200.description: Search users by username, email successfully.

401.description: User need to login first.

post.description: This endpoint let user creates a label.

401.description: User need to log in first.

409.description: Label with the same name and same scope already exists.

get.description: This endpoint let user list labels by name, scope and project_id
get.summary: List labels according to the query strings.

401.description: User need to log in first.

parameters.description: The label scope. Valid values are g and p. g for global labels and p for project labels.
parameters.name: scope

parameters.description: Relevant project ID, required when scope is p.
parameters.name: project_id

get.description: This endpoint let user list namespaces of registry according to query.

403.description: User has no privilege for the operation.

401.description: User need to login first.

get.description: This endpoint let user get latest ten gc results.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

401.description: User need to log in first.

get.description: This endpoint returns webhook jobs of a project.

403.description: User have no permission to list webhook jobs of the project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

post.description: This endpoint ping the available ldap service for test related configuration parameters.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

401.description: User need to login first.

parameters.description: ldap configuration. support input ldap service configuration. If it's a empty request, will load current configuration from the system.
parameters.name: ldapconf

post.description: Create project member relationship, the member can be one of the user_member and group_member,  The user_member need to specify user_id or username. If the user already exist in harbor DB, specify the user_id,  If does not exist in harbor DB, it will SearchAndOnBoard the user. The group_member need to specify id or ldap_group_dn. If the group already exist in harbor DB. specify the user group's id,  If does not exist, it will SearchAndOnBoard the group.

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

400.description: Illegal format of project member or project id is invalid, or LDAP DN is invalid.

409.description: A user group with same group name already exist or an LDAP user group with same DN already exist.

get.description: Get all project member information

403.description: User in session does not have permission to the project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

put.summary: Update the immutable tag rule or enable or disable the rule

200.description: Update the immutable tag rule successfully.

403.description: User have no permission to update the immutable tag rule of the project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

200.description: Delete the immutable tag rule successfully.

403.description: User have no permission to delete immutable tags of the project.

401.description: User need to log in first.

400.description: Illegal format of provided ID value.

post.summary: Test connection and authentication with email server.

401.description: User need to login first.

parameters.description: Email server settings, if some of the settings are not assigned, they will be read from system configuration.
parameters.name: settings

get.description: Get Retention Metadatas.

The Search endpoint returns information about the projects ,repositories  and helm charts offered at public status or related to the current logged in user. The response includes the project, repository list and charts in a proper display order.
get.summary: Search for projects, repositories and helm charts

parameters.description: Search parameter for project and repository name.
parameters.name: q

put.description: This endpoint is for updating the schedule of scan all job, which scans all of images in Harbor.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

401.description: User need to log in first.

parameters.description: Updates the schedule of scan all job, which scans all of images in Harbor.
parameters.name: schedule

post.description: This endpoint is for creating a schedule or a manual trigger for the scan all job, which scans all of images in Harbor.
post.summary: Create a schedule or a manual trigger for the scan all job.

403.description: User does not have permission of admin role.

401.description: User need to log in first.

503.description: Harbor is not deployed with scanners.

409.description: There is a "scanall" job in progress, so the request cannot be served.

parameters.description: Create a schedule or a manual trigger for the scan all job.
parameters.name: schedule

get.description: This endpoint is for getting a schedule for the scan all job, which scans all of images in Harbor.

200.description: Get a schedule for the scan all job, which scans all of images in Harbor.

403.description: Only admin has this authority.

401.description: User need to log in first.

200.description: Get the projects number and repositories number relevant to the user successfully.

Update Retention Policy, you can reference metadatas API for the policy model.

get.description: List quotas

X-Total-Count.description: The total count of access logs

Link.description: Link refers to the previous page and next page

403.description: User does not have permission to call this API.

401.description: User is not authenticated.

parameters.description:
Sort method, valid values include:
'hard.resource_name', '-hard.resource_name', 'used.resource_name', '-used.resource_name'.
Here '-' stands for descending order, resource_name should be the real resource name of the quota.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: The size of per page, default is 10, maximum is 100.
parameters.name: page_size

If true, the resources in the response are relative to the scope,
eg for resource '/project/1/repository' if relative is 'true' then the resource in response will be 'repository'.

parameters.description: Password to be updated, the attribute 'old_password' is optional when the API is called by the system administrator.

post.description:
This endpoint adds the selected available ldap users to harbor based on related configuration parameters from the system. System will try to guess the user email address and realname, add to harbor user information.
If have errors when import user, will return the list of importing failed uid and the failed reason.

UnsupportedMediaType.description: The Media Type of the request is not supported, it has to be "application/json"

type.description: The replication policy trigger type. The valid values are manual, event_based and scheduled.

oidc_verify_cert.description: Whether verify your OIDC server certificate, disable it if your OIDC server is hosted via self-hosted certificate.

oidc_groups_claim.description: The name of Claim in the ID token whose value is the list of group names.

email_identity.description: By default it's empty so the email_username is picked.

ldap_group_search_filter.description: The filter to search the ldap group.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current system, such as "db_auth", "ldap_auth"

self_registration.description: Whether the Harbor instance supports self-registration.  If it's set to false, admin need to add user to the instance.

oidc_scope.description: The scope sent to OIDC server during authentication, should be separated by comma. It has to contain “openid”, and “offline_access”. If you are using google, please remove “offline_access” from this field.

ldap_search_dn.description: The DN of the user to do the search.

storage_per_project.description: The default storage quota for the new created projects.

type.description: The type of scan all policy, currently the valid values are "none" and "daily"

daily_time.description: The offset in seconds of UTC 0 o'clock, only valid when the policy type is "daily"

parameter.description: The parameters of the policy, the values are dependant on the type of the policy.

verify_remote_cert.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access a remote Harbor instance for replication.

ldap_timeout.description: timeout in seconds for connection to LDAP server.

ldap_base_dn.description: The Base DN for LDAP binding.

read_only.description: 'docker push' is prohibited by Harbor if you set it to true.

quota_per_project_enable.description: This attribute indicates whether quota per project enabled in harbor

oidc_name.description: The name of the OIDC provider.

project_creation_restriction.description: This attribute restricts what users have the permission to create project.  It can be "everyone" or "adminonly".

ldap_uid.description: The attribute which is used as identity for the LDAP binding, such as "CN" or "SAMAccountname"

oidc_client_id.description: The client id of the OIDC.

ldap_group_base_dn.description: The base DN to search LDAP group.

ldap_group_attribute_name.description: The attribute which is used as identity of the LDAP group, default is cn.

email_insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the email server.

ldap_group_admin_dn.description: Specify the ldap group which have the same privilege with Harbor admin.

email_username.description: The username for authenticate against SMTP server.

oidc_endpoint.description: The URL of an OIDC-complaint server, must start with 'https://'.

count_per_project.description: The default count quota for the new created projects.

token_expiration.description: The expiration time of the token for internal Registry, in minutes.

email_ssl.description: When it's set to true the system will access Email server via TLS by default.  If it's set to false, it still will handle "STARTTLS" from server side.

email_host.description: The hostname of SMTP server that sends Email notification.

email_from.description: The sender name for Email notification.

group_name.description: The name of the user group

ldap_group_dn.description: The DN of the LDAP group if group type is 1 (LDAP group).

group_type.description: The group type, 1 for LDAP group, 2 for HTTP group.

id.description: The ID of the user group

enabled.description: The quota is enable or disable

credential_type.description: Credential type of the registry, e.g. 'basic'.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

role_code.description: Description of permissions for the role.

FilterStyle.description: The style of the resource filter

username.description: Username relevant to a project role member.

roles.description: Role ID for updating project role member.

update_time.description: The update time of the policy.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

creation_time.description: The create time of the policy.

credential_type.description: Credential type of the registry, e.g. 'basic'.

insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the server.

total.description: The total count of all tasks

admin_role_in_auth.description: indicate the admin privilege is grant by authenticator (LDAP), is always false unless it is the current login user

deprecated.description: Whether or not this chart is deprecated

appVersion.description: The version of the application enclosed in the chart

apiVersion.description: The API version of this chart

sources.description: The URL to the source code of chart

home.description: The URL to the relevant project page

icon.description: The URL to an icon file

ChartAPIError.description: The error object returned by chart repository API

error.description: The error message returned by the chart API

access_key.description: Access key, e.g. user name when credential type is 'basic'.

access_secret.description: Access secret, e.g. password when credential type is 'basic'.

job_detail.description: The webhook job notify detailed data.

url.description: A base URL of the scanner adapter.

access_credential.description: An optional value of the HTTP Authorization header sent with each request to the Scanner Adapter API.

auth.description:
Specify what authentication approach is adopted for the HTTP communications.
Supported types Basic", "Bearer" and api key header "X-ScannerAdapter-API-Key"

update_time.description: The update time of the project.

owner_name.description: The owner name of the project.

deleted.description: A deletion mark of the project.

owner_id.description: The owner ID of the project always means the creator of the project.

repo_count.description: The number of the repositories under this project.

creation_time.description: The creation time of the project.

togglable.description: Correspond to the UI about whether the project's publicity is  updatable (for UI)

current_user_role_id.description: The role ID with highest permission of the current user who triggered the API (for UI).  This attribute is deprecated and will be removed in future versions.

current_user_role_ids.description: The list of role ID of the current user who triggered the API (for UI)

chart_count.description: The total number of charts under this project.

cve_whitelist.description: The CVE whitelist of this project.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current Harbor instance.

self_registration.description: Indicate whether the Harbor instance enable user to register himself.

external_url.description: The external URL of Harbor, with protocol.

project_creation_restriction.description: Indicate who can create projects, it could be 'adminonly' or 'everyone'.

has_ca_root.description: Indicate whether there is a ca root cert file ready for download in the file system.

with_notary.description: If the Harbor instance is deployed with nested notary.

with_chartmuseum.description: If the Harbor instance is deployed with nested chartmuseum.

registry_url.description: The url of registry against which the docker command should be issued.

role_id.description: The role id 1 for projectAdmin, 2 for developer, 3 for guest, 4 for master

removed.description: A flag to indicate if the chart entry is removed

digest.description: The digest value of the chart entry

urls.description: The urls of the chart entry

created.description: The created time of the chart entry

expires_at.description: The expiration time on or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

ldap_email.description: system will try to guess the user email address form "mail" or "email" attribute.

ldap_realname.description: system will try to guess the user realname form "uid" or "cn" attribute.

ldap_username.description: search ldap user name based on ldapconf.

master_count.description: The total number of master members.

project_admin_count.description: The total number of project admin members.

developer_count.description: The total number of developer members.

chart_count.description: The total number of charts under this project.

repo_count.description: The number of the repositories under this project.

hard.description: The hard limits of the quota

used.description: The used status of the quota

guest_count.description: The total number of guest members.

update_time.description: The update time of the robot account

creation_time.description: The creation time of the robot account

expires_at.description: The expiration of robot account (in seconds)

disabled.description: The robot account is disable or enable

project_id.description: The project id of robot account

ldap_uid.description: the uid can't add to system.

ForbiddenChartAPIError.description: Operation is forbidden or quota exceeded

cve_id.description: The ID of the CVE, such as "CVE-2019-10164"

WebhookLastTrigger.description: The webhook policy and last trigger time group by event type.

enabled.description: Whether or not the webhook policy enabled.

creation_time.description: The creation time of webhook policy.

last_trigger_time.description: The last trigger time of webhook policy.

Stats.description: Stats provides the overall progress of the scan all process.

metrics.description: The metrics data for the each status

completed.description: The number of the finished scan processes triggered by the scan all action

total.description: The total number of scan processes triggered by the scan all action

requester.description: The requester identity which usually uses the ID of the scan all job

SupportedWebhookEventTypes.description: Supportted webhook event types and notify types.

CVEWhitelist.description: The CVE Whitelist for system or project

project_id.description: ID of the project which the whitelist belongs to.  For system level whitelist this attribute is zero.

expires_at.description: the time for expiration of the whitelist, in the form of seconds since epoch.  This is an optional attribute, if it's not set the CVE whitelist does not expire.

project.description: Search results of the projects that matched the filter keywords.

chart.description: Search results of the charts that macthed the filter keywords.

repository.description: Search results of the repositories that matched the filter keywords.

deleted.description: The label is deleted or not.

scope.description: The scope of label, g for global labels and p for project labels.

project_id.description: The project ID if the label is a project label.

project_name.description: The name of the project that the repository belongs to

artifact_count.description: The count of artifacts in the repository

project_public.description: The flag to indicate the publicity of the project that the repository belongs to (1 is public, 0 is not)

project_id.description: The ID of the project that the repository belongs to

pull_count.description: The count how many times the repository is pulled

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The string value of current config item

enable_content_trust.description: Whether content trust is enabled or not. If it is enabled, user can't pull unsigned images from this project. The valid values are "true", "false".

auto_scan.description: Whether scan images automatically when pushing. The valid values are "true", "false".

severity.description: If the vulnerability is high than severity defined here, the images can't be pulled. The valid values are "none", "low", "medium", "high", "critical".

reuse_sys_cve_whitelist.description: Whether this project reuse the system level CVE whitelist as the whitelist of its own.  The valid values are "true", "false". If it is set to "true" the actual whitelist associate with this project, if any, will be ignored.

public.description: The public status of the project. The valid values are "true", "false".

prevent_vul.description: Whether prevent the vulnerable images from running. The valid values are "true", "false".

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The boolean value of current config item

cron.description: The cron string for scheduled trigger

name.description: The chart name with repo name

RegistryInfo.description: The registry info contains the base info and capability declarations of the registry

supported_resource_filters.description: The filters that the registry supports

supported_triggers.description: The triggers that the registry supports

uuid.description: The identifier of the scanner registration

new_password.description: New password for marking as to be updated.

status.description: The overall health status. It is "healthy" only when all the components' status are "healthy"

update_time.description: the update time of gc job.

job_parameters.description: the job parameters of gc job.

job_kind.description: the job kind of gc job.

creation_time.description: the creation time of gc job.

job_name.description: the job name of gc job.

update_time.description: the update time of the quota

used.description: The used status of the quota

ref.description: The reference object of the quota

hard.description: The hard limits of the quota

creation_time.description: the creation time of the quota

role_id.description: The role id 1 for projectAdmin, 2 for developer, 3 for guest, 4 for master

url.description: A base URL of the scanner adapter.

access_credential.description: An optional value of the HTTP Authorization header sent with each request to the Scanner Adapter API.

auth.description:
Specify what authentication approach is adopted for the HTTP communications.
Supported types Basic", "Bearer" and api key header "X-ScannerAdapter-API-Key"

disabled.description: Indicate whether the registration is enabled or not

use_internal_addr.description: Indicate whether use internal registry addr for the scanner to pull content or not

skip_certVerify.description: Indicate if skip the certificate verification when sending HTTP requests

description.description: An optional description of this registration.
description.example: A free-to-use tool that scans container images for package vulnerabilities.

count.description: number of the components with certain severity.

hard.description: The new hard limits for the quota

update_time.description: The update time of the webhook policy.

creator.description: The creator of the webhook policy.

creation_time.description: The create time of the webhook policy.

enabled.description: Whether the webhook policy is enabled or not.

project_id.description: The project ID of webhook policy.

action.description: the action to resource that perdefined in harbor rbac

ScannerAdapterMetadata.description: The metadata info of the scanner adapter

entity_id.description: the id of entity, if the member is a user, it is user_id in user table. if the member is a user group, it is the user group's ID in user_group table.

entity_name.description: the name of the group member.

entity_type.description: the entity's type, u for user entity, g for group entity.

editable.description: The configure item can be updated or not

value.description: The integer value of current config item

count_limit.description: The count quota of the project.

cve_whitelist.description: The CVE whitelist of the project.

storage_limit.description: The storage quota of the project.

is_default.description: A flag indicating whether a scanner registration is default.

oidc_verify_cert.description: Whether verify your OIDC server certificate, disable it if your OIDC server is hosted via self-hosted certificate.

email_identity.description: By default it's empty so the email_username is picked.

ldap_group_search_filter.description: The filter to search the ldap group.

auth_mode.description: The auth mode of current system, such as "db_auth", "ldap_auth"

self_registration.description: Whether the Harbor instance supports self-registration.  If it's set to false, admin need to add user to the instance.

oidc_groups_claim.description: The name of Claim in the ID token whose value is the list of group names.

oidc_scope.description: The scope sent to OIDC server during authentication, should be separated by comma. It has to contain “openid”, and “offline_access”. If you are using google, please remove “offline_access” from this field.

ldap_search_dn.description: The DN of the user to do the search.

storage_per_project.description: The default storage quota for the new created projects.

type.description: The type of scan all policy, currently the valid values are "none" and "daily"

daily_time.description: The offset in seconds of UTC 0 o'clock, only valid when the policy type is "daily"

parameter.description: The parameters of the policy, the values are dependant on the type of the policy.

verify_remote_cert.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access a remote Harbor instance for replication.

ldap_timeout.description: timeout in seconds for connection to LDAP server.

ldap_base_dn.description: The Base DN for LDAP binding.

read_only.description: 'docker push' is prohibited by Harbor if you set it to true.

quota_per_project_enable.description: This attribute indicates whether quota per project enabled in harbor

oidc_name.description: The name of the OIDC provider.

project_creation_restriction.description: This attribute restricts what users have the permission to create project.  It can be "everyone" or "adminonly".

ldap_uid.description: The attribute which is used as identity for the LDAP binding, such as "CN" or "SAMAccountname"

oidc_client_id.description: The client id of the OIDC.

ldap_group_base_dn.description: The base DN to search LDAP group.

ldap_group_attribute_name.description: The attribute which is used as identity of the LDAP group, default is cn.

email_insecure.description: Whether or not the certificate will be verified when Harbor tries to access the email server.

ldap_group_admin_dn.description: Specify the ldap group which have the same privilege with Harbor admin.

email_username.description: The username for authenticate against SMTP server.

oidc_endpoint.description: The URL of an OIDC-complaint server, must start with 'https://'.

oidc_client_secret.description: The client secret of the OIDC.

count_per_project.description: The default count quota for the new created projects.

token_expiration.description: The expiration time of the token for internal Registry, in minutes.

email_ssl.description: When it's set to true the system will access Email server via TLS by default.  If it's set to false, it still will handle "STARTTLS" from server side.

email_host.description: The hostname of SMTP server that sends Email notification.

email_from.description: The sender name for Email notification.

disabled.description: The robot account is disable or enable

skip_cert_verify.description: Whether or not to skip cert verify.

cron.description: A cron expression, a time-based job scheduler.

type.description:
The schedule type. The valid values are 'Hourly', 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Custom', 'Manually' and 'None'.
'Manually' means to trigger it right away and 'None' means to cancel the schedule.

update_time.description: The update time of the policy.

enabled.description: Whether the policy is enabled or not.

creation_time.description: The create time of the policy.

deletion.description: Whether to replicate the deletion operation.

override.description: Whether to override the resources on the destination registry.

ldap_uid.description: The serach uid from ldap service attributes.

ldap_search_dn.description: The search dn of ldap service.

ldap_connection_timeout.description: The connect timeout of ldap service(second).

ldap_search_password.description: The search password of ldap service.

ldap_scope.description: The serach scope of ldap service.

ldap_base_dn.description: The base dn of ldap service.

ldap_filter.description: The serach filter of ldap service.

error.description: (optional) The error message when the status is "unhealthy"

total_project_count.description: The count of the total projects, only be seen when the is admin.

public_project_count.description: The count of the public projects.

private_project_count.description: The count of the private projects which the user is a member of.

public_repo_count.description: The count of the public repositories belonging to the public projects which the user is a member of.

total_repo_count.description: The count of the total repositories, only be seen when the user is admin.

private_repo_count.description: The count of the private repositories belonging to the projects which the user is a member of.

ScannerRegistration.description: Registration represents a named configuration for invoking a scanner via its adapter.

disabled.description: Indicate whether the registration is enabled or not

vendor.description: Optional property to describe the vendor of the scanner registration

description.description: An optional description of this registration.
description.example: A free-to-use tool that scans container images for package vulnerabilities.

url.description: A base URL of the scanner adapter

adapter.description: Optional property to describe the name of the scanner registration

access_credential.description: An optional value of the HTTP Authorization header sent with each request to the Scanner Adapter API.

uuid.description: The unique identifier of this registration.

auth.description:
Specify what authentication approach is adopted for the HTTP communications.
Supported types Basic", "Bearer" and api key header "X-ScannerAdapter-API-Key"

is_default.description: Indicate if the registration is set as the system default one

version.description: Optional property to describe the version of the scanner registration

health.description: Indicate the healthy of the registration

use_internal_addr.description: Indicate whether use internal registry addr for the scanner to pull content or not

skip_certVerify.description: Indicate if skip the certificate verification when sending HTTP requests

value.description: The value of replication policy filter.
